content.text:
<thinking>The user requested health status for all services with detailed display. The tool results show:

1. Account service: Healthy (200 OK)
2. Ledger service: Healthy (operational confirmation)
3. Card service: Healthy (no issues)

All services returned successful health checks. Following protocol:
- All services must be healthy to report HEALTHY
- No partial status allowed
- Must use exact "HEALTHY" text

Since all services are operational, will report combined status as HEALTHY.</thinking> HEALTHY
